No... it will search the package index

did the search, but it only finds the old 1.1.3 openoffice :/
You don't need to manually download most things
The Apt system will handle it for you
Synaptic is an Apt client
Go into Settings > Repositories
Click ok and then ok again
It will ask you if you want to update your package lists. Say yes
Once its done updating, search for openoffice by name and description again
